Yogi Kanthika can be used in the following conditions: Difficulty in swallowing Hoarseness of voice Throat irritation and throat pain Bad breath due to unproductive cough Acute Pharyngitis Dry sore throat, hoarseness of voice Acute Tonsillitis - Dry sore throat, hoarseness of voice and difficulty in swallowing Common Cold Coryza For sore throat Upper Respiratory Tract Infection Dry sore throat, Hoarseness of voice Acute Laryngitis Stridor cough, dry sore throat, hoarseness of voice Acute Epiglottitis - Stridor cough Influenza Unproductive cough, throat pain, throat Irritation.
Use under medical supervision.
